|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30UF2G18AC-XKI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EWS357AP-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|EnGenius EWS377AP|EnGenius EWS380AP|Senao}} Radio and switch chip IDs are not legible in the FCC internal photos so the QCN5024/QCN5054/QCA8072 are guesses.
===Specifications=== *Dual concurrent 802.11ax & compatible with 802.11ac client devices *WPA3 & WPA2-EAS authentication support; 3dBi integrated 2x2 antenna *Supports up to 1200Mbps (5GHz) & 574Mbps (2.4GHz frequency band) *1 GbE 802.3at PoE port for easy placement from a power source *Choice of AP, AP Mesh, or Mesh operation to meet your management *Local & remote management over EWS management switches & ezMaster
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/engenius-introduces-worlds-first-2x2-802-11ax-access-point-for-enterprise-minded-smbs-300746575.html ''EnGenius Introduces 2x2 802.11ax Access Point'' on '''PR NewsWire''']
==See also== *[[EnGenius EWS377AP]] - 802.11ax 4x4 Managed Indoor Wireless Access Point *[[EnGenius EWS357AP]] - 802.11ax 2x2 Managed Indoor Wireless Access Point *[[EnGenius EWS371AP]] - 802.11ac 4x4 Dual-Band Wave 2 Indoor Managed AP *[[EnGenius EWS370AP]] - 802.11ac 4x4 Dual-Band Wave 2 Indoor Managed AP *[[EnGenius EWS380AP]] - 802.11ac 2x2 Tri-Band Wave 2 Indoor Managed AP *[[EnGenius EWS360AP]] - 802.11ac 3x3 Dual-Band Indoor Managed AP *[[EnGenius EWS355AP]] - 802.11ac Wave 2 Managed Indoor Wireless AP
